snippet: Winning dishes at this Israeli restaurant include whiskey-roasted pork belly and fudge served with an eyedropper. Less successful: a cocktail named Rosie O’Donnell.
abstract: Rachel B Doyle reviews Mizlala by Meir Adoni restaurant in Tel Aviv, Israel.
lead_paragraph: Winning dishes at this Israeli restaurant include whiskey-roasted pork belly and fudge served with an eyedropper. Less successful: a cocktail named Rosie O’Donnell.

headline.seo: Restaurant Review: Mizlala by Meir Adoni in Tel Aviv
headline.main: Restaurant Report: Mizlala by Meir Adoni in Tel Aviv
